add.label: Add Latency
add.description: The number of clock cycles for an ADD (DEFAULT: 1)

sub.label: Sub Latency
sub.description: The number of clock cycles for a SUB (DEFAULT: 1)

and.label: And Latency
and.description: The number of clock cycles for a AND (DEFAULT: 1)

nor.label: Nor Latency
nor.description: The number of clock cycles for a NOR (DEFAULT: 1)

div.label: Div Latency
div.description: The number of clock cycles for a DIV (DEFAULT: 1)

mul.label: Mul Latency
mul.description: The number of clock cycles for a MUL (DEFAULT: 1)

mod.label: Mod Latency
mod.description: The number of clock cycles for a MUL (DEFAULT: 1)

exp.label: Exp Latency
exp.description: The number of clock cycles for a MUL (DEFAULT: 1)
